block.p: ALEXANDER - Lillian. Beloved wife of the late Elliot; loving aunt of Howard, Richard and George Schain and many grand nieces and nephews. A member of the New York Bar Association, Certified Public Accountant, an active worker for the Social Security Administration for many years and a woman of great philanthropic intent. Service 12 noon today at ''The Riverside'', 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave., NYC. In memoriam the family would appreciate donations to a charity of your choice
